trans-unit.source: Provides a visual editor to edit <xref uid="langword_csharp_ModelItem" name="ModelItem" href=""></xref> objects, and provides an area for the user to drag and drop, and otherwise edit composed elements.

This is a WPF control that acts as an editing container that displays the visualization for the data it is bound to in the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.Item%2A> property.

The WorkflowItemPresenter is one of two controls (the other being <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter>) that can be used to create a container for visualizing and editing a composed element.

It is important to note that the visualization of the composed element is not controlled by the WorkflowItemPresenter but it renders with the visualization associated in the metadata store for a given type.

The WorkflowItemPresenter is a specialized subclass of the [!INCLUDE[avalon1](~/add/includes/avalon1-md.md)]<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> that has been modified to support drag and drop, copy and paste, and other visual editing actions.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllowedItemType" name="AllowedItemType" href=""></xref>.
When this property is set, the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter> disallows dropping objects that do not conform to the `Type`.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Type" name="Type" href=""></xref> that contains the allowed item.
Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.AllowedItemType*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypeResolvingOptions"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref>.
Returns a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypeResolvingOptions"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.DroppingTypeResolvingOptions*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the string that contains the hint text for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref> control.
The hint text for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref> control.
Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.HintText*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this is the default container.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this is the default container; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.IsDefaultContainer*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the current item of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref> control.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_ModelItem" name="ModelItem" href=""></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref> control.
Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.Item*> dependency property.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified objects can be pasted.
A list of items to be pasted.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified objects can be pasted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Invoked after the start of a move operation to complete the moving of the specified item.
The item to move.
Invoked after the start of a copy operation to complete the copying of the specified items.
The items to copy.
The items cloned from the specified items.
Invoked after the start of a cut operation to complete the cutting of the specified items.
The items to cut.
The items cloned from the specified items.
Invoked after the start of a delete operation to complete the deletion of the specified items.
The items to delete.
Invoked after the start of a paste operation to complete the pasting of the specified items.
The items to paste.
The metadata associated with the items to paste.
The location where to paste the items.
A reference to the paste location.
